transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan hamara company mein call ek bhi nahi aa raha hai aapka.
Executive: Sir ek bar aap mujhe aapka jo primary mobile number hai na wo bata dijiye.
Customer: Ye Jai Baba Jai Baba se baat kar rahe hain aap Jai Baba Maruti Bhandar se.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: Achcha aapka service abhi naya hi shuru hua hai right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uh ek bar mujhe bataoge sir kya issue aa raha hai aapko service mein?
Customer: Inquiry nahi aa raha hai call nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Inquiry to abhi shuru hui hai sir abhi aaj matlab abhi recently aapki services jo hai kal hi start hai matlab abhi to shuru hi hua hai to thoda sa wait karna padega abhi lead vagaira aap consume karna shuru kariye matlab star abhi aapka chalu hua hai na kal hi start shuru hua hai aapka star.
Executive: To thoda sa lead vagaira consume karna shuru kariye aap.
Customer: Are mera MBC mein jab package tha usme call aa raha tha star mein to call aana band ho gaya total.
Executive: Abhi pura catalog aapka update hua hoga jab aapne ye shuru karaya hoga aur star mein to star ka kal se shuru hi hua hai sir abhi to shuru bhi nahi ho paya wo dhang se aaj to aap dikhna shuru hue honge to thoda sa wait aapko karna padega aur dusra ye ki aapke total jo humne do category li hongi star mein to che cities abhi bani hui hai matlab jo preferred city banti hai na jahan pe aap dikhoge 10 shahron mein dikhoge yahi logic ke sath aapko bataya hoga.
Executive: To wo preferred city aapki abhi che hi hai to alag alag matlab baki ki cities bhi ek bar aap waha se lead dekho matlab alag alag shahron se taki total jo combination aapke banenge wo 10 jagah pe banenge matlab 10 shahron mein banenge abhi jo live hua hai waha pe che shahron mein aap dikh rahe ho kyuki che hi aapki preferred locations bani hui hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to wo thoda sa apne ko badhana padega aapka mujhe location bataoge kahan kahan pe jaise mujhe Chennai dikh raha hai Delhi dikh raha hai Bangaluru dikh raha hai Pune dikh raha hai Mumbai dikh raha hai Coimbatore dikh raha hai ye sari locations dikh rahi hai sir.
Customer: Hyderabad.
Executive: Hyderabad abhi nahi hai aap dekhiye Hyderabad mein agar aapko chahiye ki mera star dikhe Hyderabad mein to Hyderabad ki na kam se kam do lead uthaiye Hyderabad location waha pe filter aata hai na matlab location ka to filter lagakar Hyderabad select karke aur Hyderabad ki lead kharidna chalu kariye aur agar past mein aapne Hyderabad ki lead agar jaise kharid rakhi hai to waha pe na aapke lead manager mein kuch unique requirement karna padega to main abhi ek kam aapko karke de dungi ki main na aapko ek account manager jo hai assign karke de deti hu.
Executive: Taki wo aapko na pura guide kar de ki ye star mein service ko kaise use karna hai taki aapka jo call hai aur ye sab aaye jara thoda time dena padta hai matlab abhi lagega usme matlab thoda sa time lagega ekdam se nahi hoga ki humne kal aaj kal live hua hai aur aaj se hume call aane lag jayenge thoda sa promotion mein aapki algorithm mein.
Customer: Mere ko tension hai madam kya jo MDC wala jo package tha mera usme to din mein ek do to call aata hi aata hai abhi isme 8 tarikh ko last call aaya uska baad bhi call nahi aaya.
Executive: Nahi to thik hai isme call aayega but thoda sa apne ko wait karna padega sir kyuki service abhi aisa nahi hai ki time ho gaya hai ya kuch bhi hai abhi just shuru hui hai to usme apni algorithm bhi aap banaoge matlab pehle shahar jaise Hyderabad hai aur kaun kaun sa city hai aapka jahan pe aap deal kar rahe ho?
Customer: Bhubaneswar.
Executive: Ek minute ruko Hyderabad Vijayawada.
Executive: Ek minute Hyderabad Bhubaneswar.
Executive: Bhubaneswar.
Executive: Ek minute rukega jara Bhubaneshwar.
Executive: Nagpur aur bataiye.
Customer: Aur aap yaha se Delhi kara dijiye Delhi.
Executive: Delhi to bana hua hai Delhi bana hua hai ha Delhi aapki preferred location bana hua hai.
Executive: Pune abhi main likh le rahi hu pehle fir main aapko bata dungi kaun kaun se bane hue hain Hyderabad Bhubaneswar Nagpur Pune aur kaun sa bataya aapne?
Customer: Mumbai mein Navi Mumbai kara dijiye.
Executive: Mumbai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To ek minute rukiyega main na aapke ye cities update kar di hai par ye mere update karne se nahi hoga is in sare shahron mein na aapko lead kharidna shuru karna padega to main abhi jo bana hua hai wo bata deti hu aapka bana hua hai Chennai fir bana hua hai Delhi bana hua hai uske baad location Bangaluru aur Pune aur Mumbai aur Coimbatore ye location.
Executive: Abhi bani hui hai to jaise Mumbai aapne mere ko bataya tha Delhi bataya tha aur Pune bataya tha ye teeno aapki chal rahi hai but isme Hyderabad nahi hai Bhubaneswar nahi hai Nagpur nahi hai to aapko kya karna hai ki jaise man lijiye aapne aapka seller open kiya thik hai ab yaha pe jaise main by lead pe gayi location ka filter aapko use karna aata hoga I am assuming ki wo aap karte honge to yaha pe maine location mein search matlab city mein Hyderabad dal diya Hyderabad city in Telangana to Hyderabad ki mere ko 6 ghante pehle ek koi manpower services ki lead dikh rahi hai uske alava labour contractor service ki lead dikh rahi hai to inki na alag alag shahron se man lijiye aapne yaha se do teen lead utha li ab dusri location aapne dekhi let suppose ki you said to me ki mere ko Bhubaneswar bhi aap promote karte hain ya fir Nagpur karte hain to maine fir dusra filter location ka Nagpur laga liya to Nagpur se mujhe jo bhi lead dikhenge abhi Nagpur ki dekhiye isme plumbing contractor ki aa rakhi hai labour contractor service ki teen din pehle ki aa rakhi hai to abhi abhi to teen din pehle wali aap kharid lo kyuki hume preferred city banani hai baki ke lead jab aap kharidoge to same day pe hi aapko kharidna hai to ye thoda sa practice aapko shuru karna hoga aur aapko pura guidance ke liye na main ek kam aur karke deti hu ki main aapko na account manager ek abhi assign kar deti hu wo pura aapko video call pe la karke sara kuch samjha denge sir.
Customer: Thik thik hai thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir wo pura aapko bata denge kaise use karna hai kis tarike se karna hai thik hai.
Customer: Thik thik hai ok thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
Executive: Haan haan haan haan baki concern main ek bar close karungi main aapko apna direct number bhi de deti hu agar kuch hota hai to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega mere number par.
Customer: Thik thik.
Executive: Aur account manager abhi dungi main account manager assign kar de rahi hu aapko wo aur guide kar denge aapko thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik thik thik.
Executive: Thik hai sir okay alright thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving any calls/inquiries.

- Previously receiving calls in MBC package.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the star service is new.

- Advised to wait and consume leads.

- Account manager will be assigned for guidance.

- Updated the customer on preferred locations.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will guide on service usage.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, preferred locations
